column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Once the food begins to arrive
column2: there's just no stopping it. I've clearly overdone it. But let me tell you the mac & cheese is some of the creamiest I've ever eaten
column3: the pasta is cooked perfectly. The potato was the size of a small child
column4: seriously this thing was enormous and
column6: loaded. The brussel sprouts were a welcome green addition to this hearty heart attack starter. The ribeye
column7: oh my! We shared it as our server had warned us early on we'd overloaded. Boy
column8: was she spot on.  The candied bacon? I'll never be the same--epic.
